CrazyGames | Operations and Product Manager | Leuven, Belgium | Full-time | Onsite

CrazyGames, a browser games company based in Leuven (Belgium), is looking for an Operations and Product Manager. As our Operations and Product Manager you will enter right into the core of a small but fast-growing tech company with a highly skilled and educated team of 4 people.

Full info here: https://www.crazygames.com/jobs

CrazyGames is a browser games platform reaching more than 10 million people per month. We are self-funded, profitable, and growing by more than 100% per year.
